about_the_game:
From the ruins of the old civilization a new west, brutal and savage, is reborn. Against the cruelty that rules the world, a man saves a dog from a tragic ending. They will join forces to survive the chaos around them. Experience an epic journey accompanied by your loyal dog: Pellet, and help him get back home.

  • Roam a living and breathing open world filled with ruthless inhabitants, fierce animals and unforgiving lands. Survive by gathering resources around you and finding a good location to set up your camp.

  • Engage in exciting shootouts and duels inspired by the western genre, third person shooter mechanics.

  • Beat enemies in a brutal hand to hand combat or use melee weapons for even deadlier effects.

  • Let Pellet be your guide on the wasteland. Use your dogs abilities to track targets, hunt beasts and look for treasures and useful materials.

  • Explore forgotten and unaccesible places where misteries and rare artifacts remain using the parkour mechanics.

  • Get and upgrade armored vehicles to travel on the dangerous roads. 

  • Train Pellet to help you in open combat or to better execute stealth strategies. He improves his skills the more you train him.

  • Enjoy real and beautiful claymations as cinematic sequnces in the main story missions.
